name: I'm losing my edge......!!!
text: #Counter Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +1000 power during this battle. Then if your trash has 10 or more cards, add up to 1 black Character card with a cost of 3 or less from your trash to your hand.

effect.text: Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +1000 power during this battle. Then if your trash has 10 or more cards, add up to 1 black Character card with a cost of 3 or less from your trash to your hand.
